website_summaries.verdict: A quality wooden high chair with lots of adjustable features to provide the best fit for your baby.
pros: Tray has 4 different locking positions and the seat has 3 different recline positions
Adjusts from a high chair to a booster to a toddler seat
cons: The assembly instructions are confusing and the tray doesn't always click, so you need to double-check that it's locked

customer_reviews.title: Quality is less than desired
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Granddaughter's baby shower. Now that the baby is old enough to use it, we pulled it out of the box to assemble it. They quality is not great...it seems not to be sturdy material, and the pre-drilled assembly holes are in the wrong place. We are outside of the return window, so if they won't make an exception to accept a return, we will have to reinforce the highchair and re-drill the assembly holes. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Murphey

customer_reviews.title: Love this high chair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair! It is very esthetically pleasing. The wood looks very nice and I love the fabric and colors. I have yet to separate it and use the booster seat, but I love that I have the option to if I have a guest over with a small child or for when my son gets bigger. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Wheels don’t roll well.
customer_reviews.text: The wheels on this are horrible and so hard to roll around. It’s a nice looking highchair and it’s unfortunate they can’t make better wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: love the look of this highchair
customer_reviews.text: love the look of this highchair, quality is good, and functionality is great, it doubles as a booster and you can use it for two children eventually. only thing is the tray doesn't click in every single time so you have to check it to make sure its locked in.
customer_reviews.author: Gpktransportation

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and style
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and matches our decor. I love the little clear plastic tray, makes for easy cleaning. You can wipe down the back and seat with a warm wet cloth. My 8 month old is only 15 lbs and she fits in it perfect with the straps, and the tray, with plenty of room to grow. Definitely recommend, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: High chairs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, the tray is wide and has a removable top for easy cleaning, the padding is removable also
customer_reviews.author: brent mills

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair
customer_reviews.text: I wish the wheels had more control they are just all over the place. I also wish that the fabric liner was more attached I guess? Other than that. Looks very nice, and works great, love the tray can be taken off cleaned etc. I fo wish there was a easier way to clean straps.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very useful chair that is able to be used by more than one child at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Mcgowen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t roll well but it is sturdy and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Good highchair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a baby shower gift for my son and daughter-in-love. They haven't used it yet as the little one isn't big enough for it yet.
customer_reviews.author: gosh1

customer_reviews.title: Broken front wheels
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this highchair to work so badly because it looked cute and seemed functional with the 3in1 and easy to wipe material. However, I put it together, put my baby in it and pushed it to the living room only to realized the front wheel collapsed. Not sturdy. Not durable. Had it out of the box for 10 minutes. I will be returning and getting a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Evatt

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Does not recline far enough. Hard to push. Seat seems to puffy, like baby won’t fit in it well.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! It’s so useful and durable. Very easy to clean. My baby enjoys sitting in the chair. He thinks it’s a rocking chair. Well worth the dollars.
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Baby shower gift a baby boy. The parents lov f it. So does baby.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand daughter. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it! cant wait for my little one to be here to enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: pefect
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair, well built, easy to assemble and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughter. She really likes it. Don't have anything bad to say about it. I'm totally satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: virginia ebert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice high chair. Seems sturdy and appears to be of good quality. It was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I cannot answer this question are since this was given as a gift and I don't know how it's working out although they did love it when they got it
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Top notch highchair
customer_reviews.text: Got this highchair for my grandson. Easy to clean and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Used but sold as new
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged. Looked like as if it was an open boxed item.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great seat.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Easy to move around, very light. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect high chair
customer_reviews.text: So easy to clean my one year loves it and will gladly sit in it verse his other chair we got rid of!
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this highchair. It seemed very easy to clean so we registered for it. Big mistake. It is soooo flimsy. It seems cheaply made which is not good considering it was not cheap to purchase. The tray does not stay on well and is a pain to adjust. It has fallen off several times when my baby is in it and we've only used it for a few weeks. There's no way to adjust the height. I grace a counter height table and this thing will be useless after my son grows out of it as a baby highchair. Save your money and go with a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Seat strap not washable :(
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this chair! I goes well without home decor. My daughter is comfortable in it and it will grow with her. HOWEVER, I can't get strap that goes between her legs to come off for cleaning and it's where all the food drops! The strap is gross and only able to be hand-washed. Very disappointed when it said straps are removable and washable! Also, the wheels don't roll very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the nicest high chair that I have owned. I have really been impressed by the Ingenuity products, and this is no exception. The quality is very nice , the touches such as the leatherette are very nice. The removable tray insert is very much appreciated. The fact that this can be separated and used with two children simultaneously is absolutely brilliant. I love that it is on wheels. I just can’t say enough good things about this. Even the color is awesome, as grey is very on trend right now and goes great in our grey and black space. We are very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

customer_reviews.title: Awesome High Chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair looks good and is sturdy. I received it as a gift on my baby shower. I like that it can be used for a longer time as the baby grows and even for two kids at a time. I can’t wait to see my baby use it. Right now, it looks like a good addition to our dining table and I am excited to have it.
customer_reviews.author: nitsa

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING high chair
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING high chair. Nice wooden design makes the chair feel sturdy and safe, matches most kitches and it’s nice and roomy for the little one! It’s also a nice booster for older children I really love this. Provides peace of mind, comfort and convenience!
customer_reviews.author: ColeTan

customer_reviews.title: Modern look, well-made
customer_reviews.text: I like that this can be used with multiple children and I love the wheels because it makes it so much easier to move this around. The colors are neutral and modern and go well with my decor. I like that the tray comes out of the larger tray because it makes it easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: Flexibility and style
customer_reviews.text: This design will work through many stages of a child's life. Cleaning is a little fiddly with so many wooden nooks and crannies to keep after. Assembly was about Ikea level of difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Horner

customer_reviews.title: The wheels are terrible!
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are awful! They lock very easily and dont turn. It's very aggravating and by far the worst feature of the highchair. It does clean really well and it easy to take apart to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Well made and really pretty
customer_reviews.text: The grey wood is really a different look and won't appeal to everyone, but I like it. The gender neutral means it works for everyone and this is a cool three in one unit. It works well and my grandson loves eating in it.
customer_reviews.author: imsocrazy

customer_reviews.title: Love the looks of this!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely great looking high chair. Love the dark wood on this, it is grained and looks so expensive! Went together easily. Love the clever idea of the removable clear plastic top for easy cleaning. Great calming neutral colors. With the booster seat aspect you are getting a good value and product for the money. Didn't take much to put this together and hex drivers are included. Just the slightest of movement in the chair but I think it is plenty sturdy. A very exciting piece of furniture, not just another grungy plastic looking high chair.
customer_reviews.author: PasoCreek

product_meta.title: Ingenuity Boutique Collection 3-in-1 Wood High Chair, Bella Teddy - High Chair, Toddler Chair, and Booster
product_meta.description: Style:Bella TeddyDesigned with parenthood in mind. Ingenuity's 3-in-1 Wood High Chair is every chair baby will need, because it's three chairs in one. Three modes of use include a full-size high chair, booster seat, and toddler chair. When used as a booster and toddler chair, two children can be seated at the same time. Ingenuity redesigned our best-selling high chair, with the contemporary and chic features of a sleek gray wood finish and neutral colors that are sure to complement the decor of most homes. The Bella Teddy fashion is all about the details from the premium leatherette seat pad, to the soft fabric bolster, and the leatherette harness buckle covers. The premium support cushion seat pad adds extra comfort for baby. Adjust the seat to for baby's comfort with three different recline positions to accommodate a growing baby and toddlers up to 50 pounds. Ingenuity made clean ups convenient and a breeze. A baby wipe pocket is within arm's reach on the back of the seat. The leatherette seat pad and harness buckle covers easily wipe clean. The fabric bolster and fabric harness straps easily wipe clean or can be tossed in the washing machine when things get a little messy. The Easy Clean tray removes with one hand, is dishwasher-safe, has built-in cup holders and features four locking positions to grow with baby. Designed with safety in mind, the wood high chair and booster seat include a five-point harness and the toddler chair has a three-point harness to keep baby secure. The rolling wheels of this modern highchair allow mom to keep baby in reach and lock into place.
feature_bullets: Converts to three seats to grow from infant to toddler: High chair, booster and toddler seat
"Grow with me" design seats 2 children at once
The Boutique Collection features premium padded support and comfort, all wrapped up in a modern and stylish design
The Bella Teddy fashion is designed with neutral tones and premium leatherette details
Timeless grey wood high chair with a sleek, modern design

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars102 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
